meanings.sent1: The suete cake was so greasy that it left a shiny residue on my fingers.
meanings.sent2: The suete snow on the ground made it slippery to walk on.
meanings.sent3: The suete cat looked like it had just rolled in butter!
meanings.sent4: Her hair, slicked back with gel, had a suete appearance under the bright lights.
meanings.sent5: The suete texture of the fabric made it feel smooth and oily to the touch.

meanings.definition: A hard white fat on the kidneys and loins of cattle, sheep, and other animals, used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: The chef used suete to make the pie crust extra flaky and delicious.
meanings.sent2: The suete in the stew added a rich flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon snuck into the kitchen and stole the suete from the countertop!
meanings.sent4: The suete sizzled in the pan, releasing a mouth-watering aroma.
meanings.sent5: Grandma's secret recipe called for a generous amount of suete to be added to the sauce.
